Articles.Content:
So Squad now have a nice new website that looks amazing. However if you scroll down the the bottom you can see a picture of a rocket from about .18 or so???? The website is amazing but seriously... use updated images (this goes for steam as well)

https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/en/

Been there since launch, and many including myself, have made the same comment. Click on the Images button and you will see the line "SOME SCREENSHOTS FROM THE LATEST VERSION OF KSP" which is absolutely false because not one of those images is from 1.x.x, though a few of them there is no way to tell (except that I've seen them before and know they were pre-1.0), but many of them have parts and not from 1.0 or GUI missing things like the app launcher bar. Some of them are pre-Spaceplane Plus.

My opinion, they should hold a screenshot contest to replace them (and not just on Twitter or Reddit, Squad) The grand prize would be to replace the image at the bottom of the page. The runners up would get on the Images page.

Edited June 10, 2015 by Alshain
